text: The A474 is a suburban main route in south Wales. Settlements served by the A474 include: *Briton Ferry *Neath *Neath Abbey *Cadoxton *Rhyddings *Fforest Goch *Rhos *Gellinudd *Pontardawe *Gelligron *Rhydyfro *Cwmgors *Gwaun-Cae- Gurwen *Glanamman *Ammanford ==References== * Category:Transport in Carmarthenshire Category:Transport in Neath Port Talbot Category:Roads in Wales
title: A474 road
